name: Grandma's Hot Hominy
author: oldcook
summary: This is a great side dish for the holidays. Grandma always served this with Thanksgiving and Christmas dinners. Goes well with turkey and dressing.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon chopped jalapeno pepper, or to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Combine hominy, garlic, and jalapeno in a saucepan
Bring to a boil, reduce heat, and simmer until hominy is tender, 15 to 20 minutes
Strain out liquid and pour hominy mixture into baking dish
Stir sour cream and butter into hominy mixture; top with Cheddar cheese
Bake in preheated oven until cheese melts, about 25 minutes
